column5: Guys, got a xmAS GIFT FOR A WEEK AT CHILDS LAKE LODGE IN JUNE OF 2008. PRIMARilY LOOKING at walleye and pike. Any info you hAVE ABOUT THE LAKES WOULD BE HELPFUL.

That's where we stayed for deer hunting last year. The Duck mountains are not really known for there walleye fishing, but they have amazing trout fishing, and some of the best are very close to Child's lake lodge.
